TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FontInfo extends System.Object

span.span: Encapsulates the font properties of text.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別來封裝文字的字型屬性。Use the class to encapsulate the font properties of text. 您可以指定的字型名稱和大小。You can specify the font name and font size. 您也可以指定字型的樣式為粗體、 斜體、 加頂線、 刪除線，還是要加上底線。You can also specify whether the style of the font is bold, italic, overlined, strikethrough, or underlined. 這個類別常用的屬性需要字型的詳細資訊，例如類別屬性類別。This class is commonly used in a property for a class that requires font information, such as the property of the class. > [!NOTE] > 這個類別沒有公用建構函式。This class does not have a public constructor. 無法直接建立類別的新執行個體。A new instance of the class cannot be created directly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何修改的屬性物件，以程式設計的方式，以指定的字型屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to modify the properties of a object programmatically to specify the font properties for a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FontInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfo/CS/fontinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FontInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfo/VB/fontinfovb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Bold { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Bold : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出字型是否為粗體。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the font is bold.

value.span: 如果字型為粗體，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the font is bold; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定或判斷字型是否為粗體。Use the property to specify or determine whether the font is bold. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以程式設計方式指定中的文字以粗體字控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically specify a bold font for the text in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FontInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfo/CS/fontinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FontInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfo/VB/fontinfovb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ClearDefaults() cil managed

summary.span: 將所有 屬性重設為未設定的狀態，並清除檢視狀態。

span.span: Resets all properties to the unset state and clears the view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性時，都會在取消設定建立物件。 properties are unset when the object is created. 當第一次設定屬性時，值會加入至檢視狀態。When a property is first set, the value is added to view state. 方法用來設定所有未設定的狀態並移除任何項目在檢視狀態中的屬性。The method is used to set all the properties to the unset state and remove any entries in view state. 下列屬性會重設：The following properties are reset: - - - - - - - -

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CopyFrom(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo f) cil managed

span.span: A that contains the font properties to duplicate.

summary.span: 將指定 的字型屬性複製到呼叫此方法的 類別執行個體。

span.span: Duplicates the font properties of the specified into the instance of the class that this method is called from.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以重複指定的字型屬性的執行個體到從呼叫這個方法的類別。Use the method to duplicate the font properties of the specified into the instance of the class that this method is called from. > [!CAUTION] > 目前的執行個體中的所有屬性類別中相關聯的屬性會取代`f`參數。All properties in the current instance of the class will be replaced by the associated property in the `f` parameter. 使用註冊的樣式時，然後複製 使用，則僅屬性複製到目的地，也就是並非所有的個別屬性。When a style is registered using , and then copied using , only the property is copied to the destination, not all the individual properties. 因此，如果您使用若要複製的字型資訊的來源屬性已註冊的是，您不會個別設定的字型樣式。Therefore, if you are using to copy font information from the property of a that is registered, you will not get the individual settings of the font from the style. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法，以重複的字型屬性成屬性控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to duplicate the font properties of a into the property of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FontInfoCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfoCopyFrom/CS/fontinfocopycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FontInfoCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfoCopyFrom/VB/fontinfocopyvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void MergeWith(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontInfo f) cil managed

span.span: A that contains the font properties to combine.

summary.span: 結合指定 的字型屬性和呼叫此方法的 類別執行個體。

span.span: Combines the font properties of the specified with the instance of the class that this method is called from.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來結合指定的字型屬性的執行個體從呼叫這個方法的類別。Use the method to combine the font properties of the specified with the instance of the class that this method is called from. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法會聯結兩個屬性藉由設定未設定目前執行個體中每一個屬性的物件類別中的對應屬性的值`f`參數。This method joins the properties of the two objects by setting each property that is not set in the current instance of the class with the value in the corresponding property of the `f` parameter. 尚未設定的屬性會被取代。Only properties that have not been set will be replaced. 如果中的屬性`f`未設定參數，它將不會取代目前的執行個體中的對應屬性類別。If a property in the `f` parameter is not set, it will not replace the corresponding property in the current instance of the class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來結合的字型屬性成屬性控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to combine the font properties of a into the property of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FontInfoCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfoCopyFrom/CS/fontinfocopycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FontInfoCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfoCopyFrom/VB/fontinfocopyvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Name : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定主要字型名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the primary font name.
The primary font name.

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定或判斷主要字型名稱。Use the property to specify or determine the primary font name. 主要字型名稱決定用來與相關聯的控制項中顯示文字的字型。The primary font name determines the font that is used to display text in the control associated with the . > [!NOTE] > 當您設定屬性，屬性會自動更新中的第一個項目屬性。When you set the property, the property is automatically updated with the first item in the property. 如果您設定屬性，屬性會自動更新為包含值的單一元素陣列屬性。If you set the property, the property is automatically updated with a single element array containing the value of the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以程式設計方式指定的字型名稱控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically specify the font name for a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FontInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfo/CS/fontinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FontInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfo/VB/fontinfovb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的字型名稱為 null。

span.span: The specified font name is null.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ Names { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ value); };
member this.Names : string[] with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定字型名稱的已排序陣列。

span.span: Gets or sets an ordered array of font names.

value.span: 字型名稱的已排序陣列。

span.span: An ordered array of font names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定，或決定的字型名稱的已排序的陣列。Use the property to specify or determine an ordered array of font names for a . 屬性通常用來儲存一份可用的字型名稱。The property is commonly used to store a list of available font names. > [!NOTE] > 當您設定屬性，屬性會自動更新中的第一個項目屬性。When you set the property, the property is automatically updated with the first item in the property. 如果您設定屬性，屬性會自動更新為包含值的單一元素陣列屬性。If you set the property, the property is automatically updated with a single element array containing the value of the property. 若要指定的字型名稱使用陣列中，設定您想要使用的字型名稱的陣列中的第一個項目。To specify the font name for the using the array, set the first element in the array to the font name you want to use. 由於屬性會自動更新的時機屬性設定，您必須操作要重新排列的順序，而不是設定陣列中項目的陣列屬性直接。Since the property is automatically updated when the property is set, you need to manipulate the array to rearrange the order of the items in the array instead of setting the property directly. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state.

The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定，或判斷字型是否包含文字的上一行。Use the property to specify or determine whether the font contains a line above the text. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. > [!NOTE] > 連結所產生的字型底線行為， ，並設定會影響控制項屬性控制項。The font underline behavior for links generated by the , , and controls is affected by setting the property of the for the control. 如果屬性設定，不論值，其值，則必須將屬性明確地連結要加上底線。If the property is set, regardless of value its value, you must set the property explicitly if you want the link to be underlined. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以程式設計方式指定為加頂線的字型中的文字控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically specify an overlined font for the text in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[FontInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfo/CS/fontinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FontInfo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FontInfo/VB/fontinfovb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用來指定或判斷字型是否包含一條線穿過的 text 屬性。Use the property to specify or determine whether the font contains a line through the text. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. > [!NOTE] > 連結所產生的字型底線行為， ，並設定會影響控制項屬性控制項。The font underline behavior for links generated by the , , and controls is affected by setting the property of the for the control. 如果屬性設定，其值為何，您必須設定屬性明確地連結要加上底線。If the property is set, regardless of its value, you must set the property explicitly if you want the link to be underlined. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以程式設計方式指定刪除線字型控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically specify a strikethrough font for a control.
